example.eg: We're not sure whether it will rain.
example.egtrans: 我们不敢肯定是否会下雨。

example.eg: Anyone, whether rich or poor, can be affected by a natural disaster.
example.egtrans: 所有人，无论贫富，都会遭到自然灾害的影响。

example.eg: Whether as a result of laziness or disinclination, the housework had clearly not been done for some time.
example.egtrans: 无论是出于懒惰还是不情愿使然，家务活显然有一段时间没有人做了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无论…还是, 不管…或者

example.eg: It is simply impossible to ascertain whether or not the department will receive enough funding next year.
example.egtrans: 这个部门明年到底能不能获得足够的资金，这一点是不可能确定的。

example.eg: I forgot to ask whether he could give me a lift to the party.
example.egtrans: 我忘记问他可不可以开车送我去派对了。

example.eg: Rita asked me if I wanted dinner.
example.egtrans: 瑞塔问我要不要吃晚饭。

example.eg: The government is debating whether to hold a referendum on this topic.
example.egtrans: 政府正在讨论是否就此问题进行全民公决。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 辩论, 争论, 讨论

example.eg: "We must determine what exactly happened that night," said Inspector Brown.
example.egtrans: “我们必须查清当晚究竟发生了什么。”调查员布朗说。

example.eg: Fred inquired whether Larry had time to help him move this weekend.  Lucie enquired when the next train for King's Cross departed.
example.egtrans: 弗莱德询问拉里这周末是否有时间帮他搬家。露西询问开往国王十字车站的下一趟火车何时出站。

dsense.name: inquire as to whether/when/how/who/what, enquire as to whether/when/how/who/what

example.eg: I am writing to to inquire as to whether your company has any vacancies.
example.egtrans: 我来信是想询问贵公司是否有职位空缺。

example.eg: I'll see if my father knows anything about it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 看看, 查明, 搞清楚

example.eg: Whether it be raining or boiling hot, we're still going to the lake.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无论是...还是..., 不管是...还是...

dsense.name: whether or not, whether or no

example.eg: We'll go to the game whether or not it rains (or: whether it rains or not).
example.egtrans: 不论是否下雨，我们都要去看比赛。
